reviewText: Used to show the Dr. Baxter films to my students & loved them. Movie is as I remember it, but DVD was of such poor quality that many parts were missing. Also couldn't even get the moon walk to play. Hoping to have better luck with the others I ordered but haven't played them yet.
very dated but accurate and entertaining information about human senses. The moonwalk is informative is not propaganda for the manned space program
I really miss Frank Baxter as Dr. Research, he made it fun to go to science class when I was a kid. There will always be a welcome place for him in my permanent film collection!
